title: Learner-Centered Blended Science Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science theories and experimental design experience
context.additional_context: Need to strengthen practical competencies linked to science curricula, ensuring accessibility to smartphone-based learning content

learning_goals: Learners can apply self-directed learning strategies at least 80% of the time in a blended learning environment
Learners interact with learning materials at least twice weekly via a mobile platform and explain scientific concepts
Learners can revise and improve their learning plans at least three times based on formative assessment feedback
Learners can share collaborative learning experiences with peer learners through integrated face-to-face-online activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
